# Resource: okta_auth_server_claim_default





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `auth_server_id` (String) Auth server ID
- `name` (String) Default auth server claim name

### Optional

- `value` (String)

- `claim_type` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
